Text: How do we know when the server is up and when it's offline?
PLEASE READ: Don't expect to connect online with this 'free server'. The kid who runs it never puts it online. You are downloading this game for the story mode.
coctopus... He had the server up for many months and about 2-3 weeks ago he took it offline so he can work on it more. Don't make false claims with something you don't know much about.
Where do we make an account for the PSU server when it is up? It wants me to put in an ID and password for something.
